The High Priest Innocentin:
One day I came * Mysterious Dark Knight *
I no longer hear the voice of the gods, but at first glance that to me is not an ordinary soldier, wandering in search of blood.
He asked me to tell the traveler in possession of the soul of the Virgin, of the Eternal Flame.
